oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: State Theatre exterior view, circa 1936
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lamb, Herman
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Black-and-white photograph of the State Theatre located on Market Street in downtown Chattanooga, Tennessee. The theater was built in 1929, later renamed Martin Theatre, and demolished in 1979. The marquee in the image reads, "THRILLS FOR ALL AGES - DELIGHTFULLY UPLIFTING DRAMA 'LAUGHING AT TROUBLE' WITH JANE DARWELL - SARA HADEN - LOIS WILSON - JOHN CARRADINE PLUS COMMEDY & NEWS."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Buildings -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga -- Pictorial works; Theaters -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga -- Pictorial works
